title: 1 token of Mistral Small in Europe
description:
The Hugging Face LLM-Perf Leaderboard benchmarks the performance of large language models (LLMs). Energy consumption is measured using CodeCarbon. We suggest that Mistral Small is equivalent to Mistrall 7B v0.1 on Huggingface. We observe that the most energy efficient Mistral 7B model with 7B parameters handles 387,772 completion tokens/kWh.

Further note that in the Hugging Face experiment, the prompt size is 256 tokens, and the output size is 256 tokens, too. However, the "Energy" value refers to 1 generated completion token. As there is no reason to believe that prompt tokens consume no energy, we apply factor 0.5x here, but use both prompt and completion tokens for our calculation.

Per token on Mistral small, that's (1/387772)*0.5 = 1.29e-6 kWh.
